name: Taffy Tales (Version 0.11.2C)
description:
Hi, I'm UberPie. I am digital artist. I've always wanted to create something amazing!

TaffyTales is a fun narrative game that perfectly combines the gameplay of classic interactive fiction games, graphic adventures, and dating simulators, to create a game experience reminiscent of titles such as 'Leisure Suit Larry' or 'Doki Doki Literature Club'. 

In TaffyTales you'll control as a boy with multiple personality disorder, that slowly discovers the dark side of citizens in his small city. The narrative in TaffyTales is based on the complex relationships among the characters, that develop over an entertaining plot that manages to stay clean despite the strongly erotic themes. 

You'll have complete freedom to discover all the secrets in TaffyTales, and can advance through the story by solving puzzles and missions -each one more difficult and demanding than the last- that unlock new characters and scenes. 

TaffyTales is a game for adults that both fans of the genre and newcomers will love. 

Update to the latest version here: https://www.patreon.com/UberPie

Taffy Tales patch v.0.11.2c notes: 

• Improved the performance of Android version.

• Fixed bug with locking map in Priscilla's house.

• Fixed bug with animations of MC, Becca and others.

• Fixed many grammar and story flow mistakes.

• Fixed bug with an incorrect ending.

Taffy Tales patch v.0.11.2b notes: 

• Fixed bug with in-game gallery.

Taffy Tales patch v.0.11.2a notes:

• Added/Continued 7 storylines involving MC, Priscilla, Becca, Mary, Ryoko, Darnell and Walter.

• Added 25+ new full scenes with 75+ unique images (including new unique backgrounds).

• Added 2 new locations(Priscilla's stables, Girl's shower) with unique background images.

• Added many new skins and animations for Gerda, Priscilla, Becca,  Darnell.

• Added new  unique animations and effects for the ingame scenes. 

• Added new items to discover.

• Added new quests & tasks.

•  Improved quality of all CG scenes, as a result, the size of the update for standalone is increased.

• Updated in-game gallery.

• Reworked almost every in-game scene. 

• Reworked a LOT of characters poses.

• Fixed bug with wrong name of MC and Mary.

• Fixed bug with Gym in Mall area.

• Classic visual novel and dating sim gameplay • 

• Quest system • 

• Many different minigames with unique gameplay • 

• Made in Unity •
